name: delete-old-s3-files
description: Just delete old objects from an S3 bucket's folder.

scripts.start: npx tsc && node --require dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.start:dev: npx tsc && node --require dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.start:prod: npx tsc && node --require dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.prod

author: @mgustavocoder
